title: Warm mushroom and sweet potato salad
ingredients: ['500g (1lb) sweet potatoes, peeled', '1 (250g) pack large flat mushrooms, sliced', '1 red pepper, deseeded, cut into chunks', '1 red onion, sliced', '2 unpeeled garlic cloves', '3 tablespoons pine nuts', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and ground black pepper', '1 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard', 'pinch caster sugar', '1 (95g) bag baby salad leaves']
